quests.name: Into Utgarde!
quests.tooltip:
Into Utgarde!Level 71

Defender Mordun has tasked you with the execution of Ingvar the Plunderer who resides deep in Utgarde.

You are then to bring his head to Vice Admiral Keller.

Requirements:
- Ingvar's Head
